material.mattext: How to deny Everyone group users access to the Partner section (/partners/)?
assign permissions to access Site Explorer module for group Everyone as "Denied"
assign permissions to access Site Explorer module for group Everyone as "Denied". Then using the Site Explorer tools assign permissions to access the folder /partners/ for group Everyone as "Deny"
using the Site Explorer tools assign permissions to access the folder /partners/ for group Everyone as "Deny"
